message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you!  To kick off the negotiations, I'm offering it to you at $10,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider that?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I can't go as low as $7,500, I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,200. I think that's a fair price that reflects the true value of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $8,200 for the product. Can you consider that?
